data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Notice of Extraordinary General Meeting to be held on February 23, 2026 at 11:30 A.M. (IST) at the registered office of the Company

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: MASKINVEST: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Board meeting held on January 29, 2026 in regard to Adoption of new set of Memorandum of Association ( MOA ) of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: MASKINVEST: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Board meeting held on January 29, 2026 in regard to Adoption of new set of Memorandum of Association ( MOA ) of the Company.

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange about Extract of Newspaper Publication of Un-Audited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30.09.2025

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy Srutinizers report of Annual General Meeting held on September 26, 2025. Further, the company has informed the Exchange regarding voting results.

data.news_body: Mask Investments Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Annual General Meeting held on September 26, 2025
